Curam Infrastructure
API Specification

Packages
curam.util.administration.fact Contains the factory classes used to create the instances for the Cúram administration infrastructure process classes
curam.util.administration.impl Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for administrating Curam.
curam.util.administration.intf Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for administrating Curam.
curam.util.administration.struct Contains the class structures used to pass details to and from the Cúram administration infrastructure process classes
curam.util.audit Contains the classes and interfaces used to handle audit information
curam.util.cache This package contains classes and interfaces for the Curam Cache service.
curam.util.cache.exception This package contains exceptions raised by the Curam Cache service.
curam.util.codetable Contains the code tables used by the Cúram infrastructure classes
curam.util.common.tab Contains base for utility classes that handle the manuipulation of the resources that store the configurations used in the tabbed user interface
curam.util.configuration This package contains classes and interfaces for the container independent application configuration.
curam.util.connectors.axis2 Contains classes for supporting incoming web services using Axis2
curam.util.connectors.mqseries Contains utility classes for connecting to other systems using JMS, such as MQ Series
curam.util.dataaccess Provides the API for accessing and processing data in a data source
curam.util.deferredprocessing.impl Contains interface definition for application-defined deferred processing callback methods
curam.util.events.impl Contains classes and interfaces that support event handling in Curam
curam.util.events.struct Contains the class structures used to pass details to and from the Cúram event infrastructure process classes
curam.util.exception Contains the various exception types thrown by Curam and classes used to manipulate these exceptions
curam.util.fact Contains the factory classes used to create the instances for the deferred processing classes
curam.util.ieg.fact  
curam.util.ieg.impl Contains the API for application client to access the IEG Engine
curam.util.ieg.intf Contains the API for application client to access the IEG Engine
curam.util.ieg.struct  
curam.util.iegtwo.struct  
curam.util.impl Contains the entry classes into the batch launcher and deferred processing utilities.
curam.util.intf Contains the entry classes into the batch launcher and deferred processing utilities.
curam.util.jms.jmslite Contains the classes that provide the JMSLite server for testing queued Curam operations (Workflow and Deferred Processing) outside of an Application Server
curam.util.jmx This package contains classes and interfaces for the Curam JMX service.
curam.util.jmx.extpoints This package contains classes used in the JMX instrumentation of application extension points.
curam.util.message  
curam.util.orgtree.impl Contains the API for the custom organisation tree loader
curam.util.resources This package contains various utility classes.
curam.util.resources.impl Contains the API for accessing the Properties Resource Cache
curam.util.rules  
curam.util.rules.evidence Contains the classes and utilities for manipulation of evidence in the business rules engine
curam.util.security Provides the classes and interfaces for the Curam's security framework
curam.util.struct Contains the class structures used to pass details to and from the deferred processing classes
curam.util.tab.impl Contains the interfaces required for dynamic support of the tabbed user interface menu bar and navigation tree
curam.util.test Contains the class and utilities which are useful for testing Curam.
curam.util.timer Contains the classes related to the generic Timer Bean functionality
curam.util.trace This package contains classes and interfaces used in application tracing.
curam.util.transaction Contains the classes useful for getting information regarding the currently executing transaction
curam.util.type Contains the fundamental object type classes that are used by the Curam.
curam.util.userpreference.impl Contains the API for use with user preferences
curam.util.workflow.impl Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for application developers to define and run workflows.
curam.util.workflow.struct Contains the class structures used to pass details to and from the Cúram workflow infrastructure process classes
curam.util.workflow.supervisor.impl Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for application developers to search for tasks based on various criteria.
curam.util.workflow.supervisor.struct Contains the class structures used to pass details to and from the infrastructure classes
curam.util.xml.fact Contains the factory classes used to create the instances for the Cúram XML and XSL administration infrastructure process classes
curam.util.xml.impl Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for administrating XSL templates and XML documents.
curam.util.xml.intf Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for administrating XSL templates and XML documents.
curam.util.xml.struct Contains the class structures used to pass details to and from the Cúram XML and XSL administration infrastructure process classes
curam.util.xmlserver The Curam XML Server is a Java application that processes XML documents generated by a Curam application server, applying XSL templates and rendering to PDF, RTF, HTML, or plain text.
